name: Typefighter (GDKO Round 3
description:
Info

Typefighter is a 2022 Game by Charcool Made for GDKO Round 3.

Typefighter is a prototype where you are a flying spaceship taking down other spaceships. There is no art, just shapes., No art was the theme of GDKO Round 3. There is a story which is unlocked after a highscore of 10, 20 and 30.

Controls

Shoot = 'shoot' or 'Shoot'

Top - 'top' or 'Top'

Bottom = 'bottom' or 'Bottom'

Middle = 'middle' or 'Middle'

Credit

Engine: Unity

Socials

Youtube: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCMzUQJQ_ZgAy4Za2EEi4X1w

Twitter: https://twitter.com/Charcool15

Twitch: https://www.twitch.tv/charcooldev

Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/charcoolyt/

Extra Info

-There is a collider extension on the text in the game over menu so make sure to click the bottom of the Play Again Button to play again
